actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to exempt any unit of local government which receives not more than $5,000 for the entitlement period from the requirement that reports of use of funds be publish in a newspaper.

summary.text: Exempts any unit of local government which receives not more than $5,000 for the entitlement period, under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act, from the requirement that reports of use of funds be published in a newspaper.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to exempt any unit of local government which receives not more than $5,000 for the entitlement period from the requirement that reports of use of funds be publish in a newspaper.
